thread.title: Kirk Norcross' girlfriend is in labour and his baby boy is "on the way" after feud with ex-fiancé over his daughter
thread.title_full: Kirk Norcross' girlfriend is in labour and his baby boy is "on the way" after feud with ex-fiancé over his daughter

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Kirk Norcross' girlfriend is in labour and his baby boy is "on the way" after feud with ex-fiancé over his daughter
text:
Kirk Norcross (Photo: Getty / Twitter / @kirk_official) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kirk Norcross has revealed that his baby is on the way – and he can't contain his excitement. 
The former TOWIE star took to Twitter to announce that his baby boy is "on his way". 
He then shared a selfie of himself and his girlfriend snoozing in hospital as they play the baby "waiting game". 
He tweeted: "The waiting game now!! He's on his way!" 
It's not the first time the 28 year old has made the hospital dash as he welcomed a daughter last year with his ex-fiancee Holli Willis last year. 
But the new baby has already caused a rift with his ex. 
Last month, the fitness fanatic claimed his ex is stopping him from seeing his daughter Violett. 
The former TOWIE hunk revealed that lately he's been having trouble getting access to her. 
In his latest post on Twitter, Kirk shared some rare baby snaps of his little girl, alongside a smattering of love-heart emojis. 
In the adorable snaps, Kirk can see seen holding tightly onto his daughter and sporting a huge grin. 
Taking to his Twitter account previously, the star revealed his family troubles when he shared pictures of his little girl alongside a heartbreaking caption. 
He wrote: “Miss my daughter so much!!!” alongside a sad face and a purple heart emoji. Kirk and Holli split before the birth of their child (Photo: Rex Features) 
It wasn't the first time he'd claimed he's been unable to see his daughter. 
Earlier in January, he wrote on Twitter that a mother should "never" stop a dad seeing their little girl. 
Kirk ranted: “Ha People commenting on stuff they no nothing about FYI a mum should never stop a dad see his daughter just because she got the Hump wid him [sic]”. 
It seems that Holli is angry about the news that Kirk is expecting a second child with another woman . He announced the news on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/kirk_norcross) Kirk Norcross (Photo: Getty) 
Taking to Twitter, the angry mum told fans she only found out about the news a MONTH ago. 
She wrote: “So just had a bit of news via TEXT message couldn't even be man enough to tell me face to face! Your having another baby by some random! 
“Due in Feb! Couldn't even wait couple months after violett was born to start f***ing someone else”. 
“So good luck to whoever you are who is having his baby in February hope you wernt expecting much out of him![sic]," she added. 
Mirror Online has contacted Kirk for comment. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
